body.name: RUIMEN Smart Watches for Women Men (Answer/Make Calls) Compatible with iPhone/Android Phones, 1.85" HD Screen Fitness Tracker Heart Rate Monitor 100+ Sports Tracker Watch Waterproof (Purple)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 52 mins
features: 【Large HD Color Screen & IP68 Waterproof】The 1.85-inch high-definition full touch screen and advanced sensors make the operation smoother, providing you with a better visual and user experience. IP68 waterproof standard allows you to enjoy water sports without fear. D1 smartwatch is designed with Bluetooth 5.2, which enable it runs faster and the data transmission is more stable.

【Health Tracker】D1 fitness watch features over 100 sports modes, which can meet the need of most sports enthusiasts. It can automatically track your daily steps, distance, and calories. 24-hour heart rate and blood oxygen monitoring to help you better understand your physical condition. You can also obtain your sleep data to help you analyze your sleep quality and develop a better sleep habit and a healthier lifestyle.

【Wide Compatibility & Personalized Watch Faces】D1 smart watch works as an extension of your phone so you can do more while on the go, bringing more convenience to your life. It works seamlessly with iPhone and Android phones. This smart watch can offer over 100 personalized watch faces to choose from, and you can also customize your watch face with your favorite photos to highlight your unique personality.

【Make/Answer Calls & Smart Notifications】After connecting D1 watch with your phone via Bluetooth, you can easily make and answer calls directly on the watch. When there is an incoming text or social media messages, it will also vibrate to remind you to check out. Never miss anything important even on the go.

【More Useful Functions】You can enjoy more practical features, such as stopwatch, timer, calculator, alarm clocks, voice assistant, music control, female cycle tracking, etc., it can be a smart assistant and an essential companion for a healthy life.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Fitness Tracker Watch This smart watch features over 100 indoor and outdoor sports modes, to meet the needs of most sports enthusiasts. It can automatically track your daily activity and provide you with exercise data, including steps, heart rate, calories and distance. You can check real-time stats during exercise. Make/Answer Calls Smartwatch After connecting the watch and mobile phone via Bluetooth, you can make and receive calls directly on the watch without taking the phone out of your pocket. You can also view contacts and call logs on the watch. Call/Messages Notifications Stay connected with your smartphone, you can receive call reminders, text messages, calendar reminders, and more. All notifications are displayed on your wrist and reminded by vibration. You won’t miss any important calls or messages.(*Note: Can't respond to texts)

Heart Rate Monitor D1 smart watch can monitor and record your real-time heart rate. You can directly view your heart rate data in the past 7 days on the watch, or view more in the app to help you understand your health better. Blood Oxygen Monitor The watch can automatically detect and record your blood oxygen saturation. Please enable automatic blood oxygen detection in the APP, and set the cycle and time interval of each detection. Sleep Tracker When you wear the watch correctly, it will automatically track your sleep and provide a detailed analysis of your sleep quality, you can view your sleep data on the watch, and you can also check more detailed data in the APP. Helps you develop healthier sleep habits.

Menstrual Health Tracking It can record female menstrual period, and provide predictions and reminders for upcoming menstrual & fertile periods, to help you plan ahead. Customized Watch Face This smartwatch can offer over 100 personalized watch dials to choose from, and you can also customize your watch face with your favorite photos to highlight your unique personality. IP68 Waterproof Watch This smart watch features upgraded IP68 waterproof, you can fully enjoy more water activities in all weather, without worrying about sweat, rain and other splashes.

FAQ Q: How to connect the watch to your phone? Please download the "GloryFit" App from Google Play or APP store. Then turn on phone's bluetooth and connect the watch in the app. It can work with most smartphones that use iOS 9.0 or Android 6.0 or above system (not work for PC and tablet). Q: Is the band changeable? and what is the size of the replacement band? Yes, the band is changeable. The band width is 22mm(0.87inch). Q: How to measure my heart rate & steps more accurately? 1. Please make sure your personal info(age,height,weight) in GloryFit app are filled in correctly.(Go to GloryFit app -> Profile) 2. Wearing too tight, raising the arm and making a fist, etc. will affect your blood circulation and thus affect the heart rate signal. It is normal that the heart rate data will be volatile at first, please wait for the heart rate value to stabilize before taking a reading. You will find that the data will be more accurate, if you measure more times and test longer. Q: Why can't your watch receive SMS and notifications? 1. Please ensure the permissions of App, messages, calls, etc. are allowed when you download the GloryFit app for the first time. 2. Allow the GloryFit app to send notifications: Open your phone settings--> Find “GloryFit” app--> Notifications--> Click “Allow Notifications”--> Tick Lock Screen/Notification Center/banners, and tick “Always(Default)” in Show Previews. 3. In the App: please switch on notification reminder in "Gloryfit". (Go to the app -> device -> SMS/APP -> switch on SMS, Facebook, other, etc.). Do not enable the "Do not Disturb Mode". *Note: Check whether the App's messages appear in pop-up box of your mobile phone. If no, the watch will fail to receive messages. Make sure they are able to show up: Phone Settings-->Notifications> Find the app you need to get notification from-->Allow Notifications.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Affordable Watch!
reviews.reviewText: This watch is a wonderful affordable smart watch that does everything that you need!This watch has many features available that most pricey watches have, except it’s a lot more affordable. It can:- track sleep- heart rate- steps- blood oxygen- menstrual cycle- take calls- show texts- check the weather- calculator- customize watch faces- set alarms- play mini gamesthe watch is very well built! it feels almost on par to more expensive watches (apple, fitbit, etc.) while doing what said watches can do.the watch band is stylish, stretchy, and comfortable. I wore it while sleeping, working, running, etc. And it never hurt my wrist or woke me up due to being uncomfortable.everything I listed above is included in a single app. you can check your health information through the app rather than using multiple.the screen is bright and colorful, and everything is easy to use and see.the touch display feels smooth and feels exactly like an apple watch’s touch display.the ui is also easy to navigate and you can customize how you navigate. similar to an Apple Watch, you can set the menu to be bubble-like or a simple list you scroll through to access applications. I never had any issues with the screen glitching out or being too slow.the screen is large! 46mm to be exact. my wrists are super tiny so the screen covered most of my wrist, but it’s comfortable so it wasn’t an issue.THE BATTERY LIFE. this watch has lasted days on one charge, which is what stood out to me the most when comparing to high end watches!! It’s advertised to last 5 days with normal use but 30 days in standby on a two hour charge. I found charging the watch to 100% took way less than two hours, though I didn’t track the exact time! Currently going 3 days and still around 90% battery.Texts messages and phones calls always show up as well!I found this watch super convenient to use and it’ll make a great gift for those who want a smart watch of any kind!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable, nice and functional smart watch
reviews.reviewText: I got the RUIMEN Smart Watch in black, and it is very nice and easy to set up and use. Setting it up was simple and quick, using Bluetooth connectivity with my iPhone. Within no time, it automatically updated to the latest software version, and its user-friendly interface made navigation easy.The battery life is good, after a full charge, I can enjoy two full days of usage without needing to recharge. The watch also has common important features like heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, and exercise tracking. Plus, it's water-resistant, so I can keep it on while washing my hands or during light rain, and it has been working great so far.The fitness tracker feature offers several sports modes. It automatically tracks my daily activity, providing valuable exercise data, including steps, heart rate, calories, and distance. Additionally, the watch's ability to make and answer calls directly via Bluetooth connection is convenient. The call and message notifications displayed are useful too, although I can't respond to texts directly from the watch. In general, I recommend it for the price, is an affordable, simple, functional, and stylish watch for everyday users.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great smart watch for an incredible price
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the RUIMEN smart watch 2023 Ver. in black and have been checking it out for several days now. The setup was rather effortless, and it was easy to pair the watch with my Android phone via Bluetooth. It also charges very fast, and the battery lasts for over 3-4 days.I’m a petite person, and this watch feels light, and the band is adjustable to fit nicely on my small wrist. It is also comfortable to wear while sleeping. The watch is also waterproof, so you can wear it during workouts and swimming.The HD color display is sharp, very responsive to touch and is a decent size. One of the exciting features for me is the option to customize the watch face with a picture of my cats. They also have numerous other watch faces to choose from and I can change them to match what I wear. It also has a flashlight function which is very useful at night.The fitness tracker features of the watch are comparable to Fitbit and Google Fit that I have used in the past. It has several sport modes to choose from, and tracks steps, heart rate and blood oxygen levels almost as accurately as the other trackers. It also has comparable sleep tracker functions to monitor your sleep quality and duration.You can easily make and receive phone calls and text messages directly from the watch. It also has music playback control which is very nice.The app could use some work as far as English usage is concerned but it does not limit its functionality.Overall, it is a budget-friendly smart watch with many amazing features.

The media could not be loaded. Me gusta mucho, ha sido fácil vincularlo con mi teléfono.Tiene muchas funciones útiles y prácticas.Se puede aceptar y rechazar llamadas sin utilizar el teléfono, recibir mensajes y notificaciones, también tiene teclado para poder marcar el número al que se desee llamar.Me gusta poder controlar remotamente la cámara.Hay formas diferentes de visualizar todas las funciones del reloj, puede ser en lista o en mosaico.Asistentes deportivos y de saludLas instrucciones están en español lo que hace fácil su manejo y puesta a punto.Se puede elegir entre varios diseños de reloj e incluso personalizarlo con foto propia.También tiene una linterna que puede ser muy útil en algunas ocasiones.Llevo poco tiempo con él y seguro que iré descubriendo más utilidades.Resumiendo: Muy satisfecha con mi compra.El envío fue muy rapido y la relación calidad/precio es muy buena.No hay nada negativo que resaltar.Personalmente a mí me gustan más las correas que no tienen hebilla pero no es un inconveniente.

The media could not be loaded. Die Uhr wurde sehr schnell und ohne Probleme geliefert. Mir ihrem modernen Design ist sie ein stilvolles Accessoir. Die Uhr hat viele nützliche Features die den Alltag erleichtern. Die Bedienung und Einstellung der Uhr ist dank der dazu gehörigen App kinderleicht. Mit ihr kann man noch weitere Einstellungen vornehmen und das Hintergrundbild in ein persönliches Foto ändern, falls man in den vorgegebenen Hintergrundbildern nichts passendes für sich entdeckt. Das Handbuch ist super strukturiert und hilft bei einem reibungslosen Start. Die Inbetriebnahme des Ladekabels ist auch sehr einfach. Das Zusammenspiel von Benutzerfreundlichkeit, Gesundheitsüberwachung und Funktionalität ist super! Die Akkulaufzeit ist ebenfalls top. So kommt man problemlos durch den Alltag. Die Uhr hat ein super Tragegefühl und ist sehr leicht, was das Tragen sehr angenehm macht. Alles in allem eine großartige Uhr für den tollen Preis

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this Smartwatch that allows to answer and make calls. This smartwatch has truly exceeded my expectations in so many ways, and I'm delighted to share my positive experience.First and foremost, the design of this smartwatch is sleek and stylish, making it a perfect accessory for any outfit and suitable for both men and women. The display is crystal clear, vibrant, and easy to read, ensuring that I can access all the information I need at a glance.The smartwatch also offers a wide range of other features that have improved my daily routine. The fitness tracking capabilities help me stay motivated and monitor my health more effectively. I can keep tabs on my steps, heart rate, and even receive notifications for when it's time to get up and move around. This has encouraged me to lead a more active lifestyle.Pairing the watch with my smartphone was a breeze, and the battery life has been impressive. I can go for days without needing to recharge, which is a significant plus.The user interface is intuitive, making it easy to navigate through different apps and functions. It seamlessly syncs with my phone, allowing me to receive notifications for messages directly on my wrist.The build quality feels durable, and I appreciate the water-resistant feature, giving me peace of mind when I'm caught in unexpected rain or working out. The smartwatch also allows for custom watch faces, allowing me to personalize my device to suit my style and mood.

Première montre connectée pour moi et c’est un vrai plaisir de l’avoir !Reçue rapidement !En plus d’être belle, elle a de nombreuses fonctionnalités qui me sont utiles au quotidien.Elle est légère et agréable à porter, très facile d’utilisation et intuitive !!Vous pouvez passer des appels, recevoir des sms, notifications, suivre votre sommeil, rythme cardiaque et vous challengez sur le nombre de pas !!Indispensable au quotidien pour moi, elle ne me quitte plus !

Certo, ecco una possibile recensione di un smartwatch:Un dispositivo che mi ha davvero colpito. Iniziamo con il design: questo smartwatch ha una forma elegante e moderna, con un display touchscreen ampio e luminoso che rende la navigazione intuitiva. È leggero e confortevole da indossare tutto il giorno.Offre una vasta gamma di funzioni, tra cui monitoraggio della frequenza cardiaca, tracciamento del sonno, GPS integrato e persino la possibilità di ricevere notifiche dal mio smartphone. Queste caratteristiche sono estremamente utili per tenere traccia della mia salute e rimanere connesso in modo efficiente.La durata della batteria è stata una piacevole sorpresa.Un aspetto che potrebbe migliorare è la compatibilità con le app di terze parti. Non tutte le app che uso quotidianamente sono completamente integrate, il che può essere un po' limitante.In generale, è un dispositivo eccellente per chi cerca un equilibrio tra stile, funzionalità e durata della batteria. Con un prezzo competitivo, è una scelta intelligente per chiunque voglia migliorare il proprio stile di vita con un po' di tecnologia al polso.
